user_query: I want to find the top tracks by Eminem on Deezer and provide me with their download links, as well as calculate the exchange rate from USD to GBP and find out the cost of an album in pounds.

TaskList.description: Query Deezer for the top tracks by Eminem.
Retrieve download links for the top tracks obtained from Step 1.
Query for the current exchange rate from USD to GBP.
Calculate the cost of the album in GBP based on the exchange rate obtained from Step 3.
